mapper.select: SELECT dbo.INVMB.MB002 AS prdName, dbo.INVMB.MB001 AS prdNo, dbo.INVMI.MI002 AS prdProperty, dbo.INVMB.MB003 AS specs, dbo.INVMB.MB064 AS totalStock FROM dbo.INVMB INNER JOIN dbo.INVMI ON dbo.INVMB.MB025 = dbo.INVMI.MI001 WHERE dbo.INVMB.MB001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dbo.PURTD.TD001 AS purchaseKind, dbo.PURTD.TD002 AS purchaseNumber, dbo.PURTH.TH002 AS stockNumber, convert(datetime,dbo.PURTC.TC003,121) AS purchaseTime, dbo.PURMA.MA003 AS supplierName, dbo.PURTD.TD008 AS purchaseAmount, dbo.PURTD.TD009 AS unit, dbo.PURTD.TD015 AS deliveredAmount, dbo.PURTH.TH007 AS unCheckAmount, dbo.PURTD.TD008- dbo.PURTD.TD015 AS undeliveredAmount FROM dbo.INVMB INNER JOIN dbo.PURTD ON dbo.INVMB.MB001 = dbo.PURTD.TD004 INNER JOIN dbo.PURTC ON dbo.PURTD.TD001 = dbo.PURTC.TC001 AND dbo.PURTD.TD002 = dbo.PURTC.TC002 AND dbo.PURTD.TD001 = dbo.PURTC.TC001 AND dbo.PURTD.TD002 = dbo.PURTC.TC002 INNER JOIN dbo.PURMA ON dbo.PURTC.TC004 = dbo.PURMA.MA001 INNER JOIN dbo.PURTH ON dbo.INVMB.MB001 = dbo.PURTH.TH004 AND dbo.PURTH.TH013 = dbo.PURTD.TD003 AND dbo.PURTD.TD001 = dbo.PURTH.TH011 AND dbo.PURTD.TD002 =dbo.PURTH.TH012 WHERE dbo.PURTD.TD016 = 'N' AND dbo.INVMB.MB001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dbo.INVMB.MB001 AS prdNo, dbo.MOCTA.TA001 AS workOrderKind, dbo.MOCTA.TA002 AS workOrderNo, dbo.INVMI.MI002 AS properties, dbo.SFCTA.TA003 AS processingSequence, dbo.SFCTA.TA010 AS inputAmount, dbo.SFCTA.TA011 AS finishAmount, dbo.SFCTA.TA012 AS scrapAmount, dbo.SFCTA.TA017 AS transferAmount, dbo.SFCTA.TA006 AS supplierNo, dbo.SFCTA.TA010 + dbo.SFCTA.TA013 + dbo.SFCTA.TA016 - dbo.SFCTA.TA011 - dbo.SFCTA.TA012 - dbo.SFCTA.TA014 - dbo.SFCTA.TA015 - dbo.SFCTA.TA048 AS leaveAmount FROM dbo.INVMB INNER JOIN dbo.MOCTA ON dbo.INVMB.MB001 = dbo.MOCTA.TA006 INNER JOIN dbo.SFCTA ON dbo.MOCTA.TA001 = dbo.SFCTA.TA001 INNER JOIN dbo.INVMI ON dbo.INVMB.MB025 = dbo.INVMI.MI001 AND dbo.MOCTA.TA002 = dbo.SFCTA.TA002 WHERE dbo.MOCTA.TA011 = '3' AND dbo.INVMB.MB001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dbo.INVMB.MB001 AS prdNo, dbo.INVMB.MB002 AS prdName, dbo.INVMI.MI002 AS prdProperty, dbo.INVMB.MB064 AS totalStock FROM dbo.BOMCB INNER JOIN dbo.INVMB ON dbo.BOMCB.CB005 = dbo.INVMB.MB001 INNER JOIN dbo.INVMI ON dbo.INVMB.MB025 = dbo.INVMI.MI001 WHERE dbo.BOMCB.CB001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT dbo.CMSMC.MC002 AS WareHouse, dbo.INVMC.MC007 AS WareCount FROM dbo.INVMC INNER JOIN dbo.CMSMC ON dbo.INVMC.MC002 = dbo.CMSMC.MC001 WHERE dbo.INVMC.MC001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dbo.INVMC.MC002 NOT IN ('1305','1306','1402','1403','1408','2301')

SELECT dbo.CMSMC.MC002 AS WareHouse, dbo.INVMC.MC007 AS WareCount FROM dbo.INVMC INNER JOIN dbo.CMSMC ON dbo.INVMC.MC002 = dbo.CMSMC.MC001 WHERE dbo.INVMC.MC001 = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dbo.INVMC.MC002 IN ('1001','2001','8001')
